eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A SHELTER IN PLACE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Garfield, CO; AT 05:12 PM ON NOV 23, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:12 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Western Star Inn, west Rifle: There is a law enforcement presence in the area. Please avoid the area, stay inside, lock doors and windows.
